metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3467 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Debian-edu-config all versions < 2.11.10, a set of configuration files usedfor Debian Edu, and debian-lan-config < 0.26, configured too permissiveACLs for the Kerberos admin server, which allowed password changes forother Kerberos user principals.

criterions.comment: debian-lan-config: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
